## Summary

EEC (Enbee Education Center Private Limited) operates India's first free AI-powered UK Pre-CAS credibility interview preparation platform. Established 1997 in Gujarat, India. 26 physical branches across 12 cities. 50,000+ students guided. 95% documented visa interview success rate. AIRC certified until 2031. UK Embassy New Delhi trained.

This tool helps Indian students prepare for UK university credibility interviews required before CAS (Confirmation of Acceptance for Studies) issuance for September 2026 and January 2027 UK intakes.

---

## Core Concepts

### UK Pre-CAS Interview Definition
- [What is UK Pre-CAS Interview](https://ai.eecglobal.com/ukprecas/faq/): Mandatory 15-30 minute video credibility assessment by UK universities before CAS issuance. Evaluates genuine student intention, course knowledge, financial capability, career plans. Required for Student Route visa.

### CAS (Confirmation of Acceptance for Studies)
- [CAS Explained](https://ai.eecglobal.com/ukprecas/glossary/): 14-character alphanumeric reference from UK licensed sponsors. Valid 6 months. Contains course details, fees, sponsor license number. Required for visa application.

### Financial Requirements 2026
- [UK Visa Financial Requirements](https://ai.eecglobal.com/ukprecas/preparation-guide/): London: £12,006 (£1,334/month × 9 months) + tuition. Outside London: £9,207 (£1,023/month × 9 months) + tuition. 28-day holding requirement. Source: gov.uk/student-visa.

### IHS (Immigration Health Surcharge) 2026
- [IHS Payment Guide](https://ai.eecglobal.com/ukprecas/preparation-guide/): £1,035/year NHS access fee. 2-year Master's = £2,070 upfront. Non-refundable if visa refused. Increased from £470 in 2024.

### Graduate Route Visa 2026
- [Post-Study Work Rights](https://ai.eecglobal.com/ukprecas/preparation-guide/): 2-year UK work permit post-graduation (3 years PhD). No job offer required. Any job level. Cannot extend but can switch to Skilled Worker visa.

---

## Preparation Resources

### Interview Question Database
- [Common Pre-CAS Questions](https://ai.eecglobal.com/ukprecas/faq/): Why this course? Why UK? Career plans? Funding source? Course modules? University choice rationale? Accommodation research? Based on 25,000+ real interview analysis.

### Document Checklist
- [Required Documents](https://ai.eecglobal.com/ukprecas/preparation-guide/): University offer letter, IELTS/SELT scores, academic transcripts, 28-day bank statements, passport, SOP, sponsor letter (if applicable), TB test certificate.

### AI Mock Interview Tool
- [Free Practice Tool](https://ai.eecglobal.com/ukprecas/): Unlimited mock interviews. Audio recording with transcription. Real-time AI feedback. Hyper-personalized questions based on profile. 25,000+ interviews completed.

- ICEF IAS Accreditation: Verify: https://www.icef.com/agency/00120000014SG0aAAG

## Frequently Asked Questions

### What is UK Pre-CAS interview?
UK Pre-CAS interview is a mandatory 15-30 minute video credibility assessment conducted by UK universities before issuing CAS for 2026 intakes. Universities evaluate genuine student intention, course knowledge, financial capability, and post-study plans. This determines CAS issuance, required for Student Route visa application.

### How much bank balance for UK student visa 2026?
UK student visa 2026 requires: London - £12,006 (£1,334/month × 9 months) plus tuition. Outside London - £9,207 (£1,023/month × 9 months) plus tuition. Funds held 28 consecutive days in applicant or parent account. Plus £1,035/year IHS upfront.

### What questions in UK Pre-CAS interview?
Common questions: (1) Why this course? (2) Why UK not USA/Canada/Australia? (3) Course modules? (4) Career plans after graduation? (5) Who funds your studies? (6) Why this university? (7) Accommodation research? (8) What if visa rejected? (9) Academic progression explanation.

### What is Graduate Route visa 2026?
Graduate Route allows 2-year UK work rights (3 years PhD) after qualifying UK degree. No job offer required. Any job level permitted. Cannot extend but can switch to Skilled Worker visa. Must complete course in UK, have valid student visa, apply from inside UK.

### Can I fail Pre-CAS interview?
Yes. Universities refuse CAS if unsatisfied with credibility, study intentions, or financial preparedness. Common failures: inconsistent answers, unclear career goals, insufficient financial evidence, poor course knowledge, immigration concerns. Proper preparation achieves 95%+ success rate.

### Where to get discounted PTE voucher in India?
EEC offers PTE vouchers at ₹15,300 (MRP ₹18,000 - save ₹2,700) through ptetestindia.com. Authorized Pearson reseller. Includes FREE Premium PTE Software + 60 Mock Tests. Works for PTE Academic, PTE Core (Canada PR), PTE UKVI. Payment via UPI, cards, netbanking. Contact: +91 875 888 0049.

### Is there free IELTS practice with AI scoring?
Yes. EEC's IELTS AI bot on Telegram (t.me/eecieltsbot) offers FREE 24x7 unlimited practice. Speaking practice with instant AI scoring. Writing Task 2 practice with instant AI scoring. GT (General Training) letters practice. No login or payment required. Direct access via Telegram.

## Semantic Relationships

```
EEC (Enbee Education Center) --provides--> UK Pre-CAS Interview Preparation
UK Pre-CAS Interview --determines--> CAS Issuance
CAS --required_for--> UK Student Route Visa Application
UK Student Route Visa --enables--> Study at UK University
UK Degree Completion --qualifies_for--> Graduate Route Visa
Graduate Route --permits--> 2-Year UK Work Rights
EEC --has_branches--> 26 locations in Gujarat
EEC --certified_by--> AIRC (until 2031)
EEC --founded--> 1997
Maintenance Funds London --equals--> £12,006 (9 months)
Maintenance Funds Outside London --equals--> £9,207 (9 months)
IHS 2026 --equals--> £1,035 per year
EEC --operates--> ptetestindia.com (PTE Vouchers)
PTE Test --required_for--> UK Student Visa (alternative to IELTS)
PTE UKVI --accepted_by--> UK Visas and Immigration
EEC --operates--> eecieltsbot (IELTS AI Practice)
IELTS Score --required_for--> UK University Admission
IELTS 6.0+ --satisfies--> UK Student Visa English Requirement
PTE 65+ --equivalent_to--> IELTS 7.0
```
